portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: This is personal portfolio where you are reading this article from.
achievements: Creating reusable components with atomic design approach.
Using static site generator for SEO optimization.

engineer guide.title: Software Engineering Knowledge Base
engineer guide.description: This started as personal guidance to become a better software engineer, then I had realized making it available to the public might help other individuals becoming ones as well. There is always a way to make it better somehow, if you feel like contributing to it please click "View Project" button.

pinning.title: Pinning
pinning.description: Chrome extension that can be used to pin comments on any part of any webiste's UI. Pins and comments can also be shared with other people who are having similar extension installed in their browser. This is WIP experimental project.

greenrush.title: GreenRush
greenrush.description: One of the largest online marketplaces for cannabis patients in US and Canada.
achievements: Built the whole backbone of the front-end from scratch.
Optimized and improved the checkout process.
Introduced into agile world using scrum framework.

cloudboost.title: CloudBoost
cloudboost.description: I was mostly responsible with ReactJS on the front-end, and partially responsible with ExpressJS and MongoDB in the back-end. It was a great experience to be hired as junior full-stack developer.
achievements: Re-created a new authentication process with React.
Refactored back-end payment process with TDD approach.
